recipesJson.name: Touch Jesus
recipesJson.author: BCrunk
recipesJson.description: A very strawberry-y peachy vape with a touch of custard in the background.

reviews.text: Very good, I let it steep for a week and am now trying it, it is fantastic, if you vaped this without knowing what was in it you'd swear there was a LOT more to it, but literally only 3 ingredients, i find it hard to believe even knowing i mixed it myself. Thanks a ton for sharing!
